channel.title: room on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in room on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Arrived in Sugarland
item.description: (written 22:12 Friday 04 October 2019 CDT) Ma and I chatted while waiting for Nico to arrive and clear customs. Fun chatting with her and nearly finished solving the latest NYT crossword puzzle. I can see how it would be a good way to keep the ol’ left brain sharp. I chatted with the nice driver of the shuttle bus as she drove us to the IAH parking lot a couple miles away from the airport.

item.title: cleaning my room
item.description:
11:02 Sunday 22 January 2017 JST Last weekend I put shelves together in my room, and today I’m clearing off my glass desk (old computer desk), soon to be my new marble track desk.
13:05 Moved my desk to make it the way I wanted in the first place.
15:52 Sunday 22 January 2017 JST And now we finished moving my computer desk and even unpacking the last two boxes I hadn’t unpacked since moving here in June 2016.

item.title: New shelves
item.description: 14:40 Monday 02 January 2017 JST I think December 30th is the date Lin and I went to Nittori and ordered some shelves for my room. They are almost exactly what I would have designed and built for myself, given time and materials.
